basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹Hello, My name is Dylan and I am a software developer, I have a background in aerospace production and sales, I have always been a problem solver, and when I learned that at every level of software development you are solving problems, and working in teams to make things smooth I knew it was for me. I decided to learn full stack software development so that I could be hands on in whatever step of the process I needed to be to ensure my team feels supported, I hope to use these skills to improve processes and morale within a team of hard working people. I think sales and working in production for so long gives me a high level of retention towards a positive attitude and my people skills really shine in every environment I put myself in.

projects.title: Memory Mashup
projects.description: Memory Mashup was my Code Fellows 201 final group project. A memory game that uses a game to build memory retention. Built in vanilla JavaScript, Css, and HTML, colors styled after my favorite hockey team the Seattle Kraken.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I Built a JS enabled application that took in clicks to measure statistics and produce data rendered in charts, based of the most trafficed item

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: Salmon cookies is an application/ website that took in datat in a js enebaled form function and revealed the avereage sales per store from locations sarrounding the world
